\x68\x65\x6c\x6c\x6f
\x49\x20\x61\x6d\x20\x61\x20\x73\x74\x75\x64\x65\x6e\x74\x2e
\x54\x68\x65\x20\x73\x75\x6e\x20\x73\x65\x74\x73\x20\x62\x65\x68\x69\x6e\x64\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x6d\x6f\x75\x6e\x74\x61\x69\x6e\x73\x2c\x20\x70\x61\x69\x6e\x74\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x73\x6b\x79\x20\x69\x6e\x20\x73\x68\x61\x64\x65\x73\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x6f\x72\x61\x6e\x67\x65\x20\x61\x6e\x64\x20\x70\x69\x6e\x6b\x2e
\x41\x73\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x72\x61\x69\x6e\x20\x70\x6f\x75\x72\x73\x20\x6f\x75\x74\x73\x69\x64\x65\x2c\x20\x49\x20\x63\x75\x72\x6c\x20\x75\x70\x20\x77\x69\x74\x68\x20\x61\x20\x67\x6f\x6f\x64\x20\x62\x6f\x6f\x6b\x20\x61\x6e\x64\x20\x61\x20\x68\x6f\x74\x20\x63\x75\x70\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x74\x65\x61\x2e
\x54\x68\x65\x20\x63\x75\x72\x69\x6f\x75\x73\x20\x63\x61\x74\x20\x70\x61\x77\x73\x20\x61\x74\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x77\x69\x6e\x64\x6f\x77\x2c\x20\x77\x61\x74\x63\x68\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x62\x69\x72\x64\x73\x20\x6f\x75\x74\x73\x69\x64\x65\x20\x77\x69\x74\x68\x20\x69\x6e\x74\x65\x72\x65\x73\x74\x2e
\x49\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x62\x75\x73\x74\x6c\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x63\x69\x74\x79\x2c\x20\x61\x20\x73\x74\x72\x65\x65\x74\x20\x70\x65\x72\x66\x6f\x72\x6d\x65\x72\x20\x63\x61\x70\x74\x69\x76\x61\x74\x65\x73\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x63\x72\x6f\x77\x64\x20\x77\x69\x74\x68\x20\x68\x69\x73\x20\x6d\x65\x73\x6d\x65\x72\x69\x7a\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x6d\x75\x73\x69\x63\x2e
\x41\x66\x74\x65\x72\x20\x61\x20\x6c\x6f\x6e\x67\x20\x64\x61\x79\x20\x61\x74\x20\x77\x6f\x72\x6b\x2c\x20\x49\x20\x65\x6e\x6a\x6f\x79\x20\x61\x20\x72\x65\x6c\x61\x78\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x62\x61\x74\x68\x20\x66\x69\x6c\x6c\x65\x64\x20\x77\x69\x74\x68\x20\x73\x6f\x6f\x74\x68\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x6c\x61\x76\x65\x6e\x64\x65\x72\x20\x62\x75\x62\x62\x6c\x65\x73\x2e
\x4c\x6f\x73\x74\x20\x69\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x6f\x75\x67\x68\x74\x2c\x20\x73\x68\x65\x20\x67\x61\x7a\x65\x73\x20\x6f\x75\x74\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x74\x72\x61\x69\x6e\x20\x77\x69\x6e\x64\x6f\x77\x2c\x20\x77\x61\x74\x63\x68\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x77\x6f\x72\x6c\x64\x20\x70\x61\x73\x73\x20\x62\x79\x2e
\x54\x68\x65\x20\x61\x72\x6f\x6d\x61\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x66\x72\x65\x73\x68\x6c\x79\x20\x62\x61\x6b\x65\x64\x20\x62\x72\x65\x61\x64\x20\x66\x69\x6c\x6c\x73\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x61\x69\x72\x20\x61\x73\x20\x49\x20\x65\x6e\x74\x65\x72\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x62\x61\x6b\x65\x72\x79\x20\x6f\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x63\x6f\x72\x6e\x65\x72\x2e
\x57\x69\x74\x68\x20\x61\x20\x62\x61\x63\x6b\x70\x61\x63\x6b\x20\x6f\x6e\x20\x6d\x79\x20\x73\x68\x6f\x75\x6c\x64\x65\x72\x73\x20\x61\x6e\x64\x20\x61\x20\x6d\x61\x70\x20\x69\x6e\x20\x68\x61\x6e\x64\x2c\x20\x49\x20\x73\x65\x74\x20\x6f\x66\x66\x20\x6f\x6e\x20\x61\x6e\x20\x61\x64\x76\x65\x6e\x74\x75\x72\x65\x20\x74\x6f\x20\x65\x78\x70\x6c\x6f\x72\x65\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x75\x6e\x6b\x6e\x6f\x77\x6e\x2e
\x54\x68\x65\x20\x6c\x61\x75\x67\x68\x74\x65\x72\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x63\x68\x69\x6c\x64\x72\x65\x6e\x20\x65\x63\x68\x6f\x65\x73\x20\x74\x68\x72\x6f\x75\x67\x68\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x70\x61\x72\x6b\x20\x61\x73\x20\x74\x68\x65\x79\x20\x70\x6c\x61\x79\x20\x6f\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x73\x77\x69\x6e\x67\x73\x20\x61\x6e\x64\x20\x73\x6c\x69\x64\x65\x73\x2e
\x49\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x70\x65\x61\x63\x65\x66\x75\x6c\x20\x63\x6f\x75\x6e\x74\x72\x79\x73\x69\x64\x65\x2c\x20\x66\x69\x65\x6c\x64\x73\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x66\x6c\x6f\x77\x65\x72\x73\x20\x73\x77\x61\x79\x20\x67\x65\x6e\x74\x6c\x79\x20\x69\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x62\x72\x65\x65\x7a\x65\x2e
\x54\x68\x65\x20\x6f\x6c\x64\x20\x6f\x61\x6b\x20\x74\x72\x65\x65\x20\x73\x74\x61\x6e\x64\x73\x20\x74\x61\x6c\x6c\x20\x69\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x6d\x69\x64\x64\x6c\x65\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x6d\x65\x61\x64\x6f\x77\x2c\x20\x61\x20\x73\x79\x6d\x62\x6f\x6c\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x73\x74\x72\x65\x6e\x67\x74\x68\x20\x61\x6e\x64\x20\x72\x65\x73\x69\x6c\x69\x65\x6e\x63\x65\x2e
\x41\x73\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x77\x61\x76\x65\x73\x20\x63\x72\x61\x73\x68\x20\x61\x67\x61\x69\x6e\x73\x74\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x73\x68\x6f\x72\x65\x2c\x20\x73\x65\x61\x67\x75\x6c\x6c\x73\x20\x73\x6f\x61\x72\x20\x67\x72\x61\x63\x65\x66\x75\x6c\x6c\x79\x20\x69\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x73\x6b\x79\x20\x61\x62\x6f\x76\x65\x2e
\x41\x66\x74\x65\x72\x20\x79\x65\x61\x72\x73\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x68\x61\x72\x64\x20\x77\x6f\x72\x6b\x20\x61\x6e\x64\x20\x64\x65\x64\x69\x63\x61\x74\x69\x6f\x6e\x2c\x20\x73\x68\x65\x20\x66\x69\x6e\x61\x6c\x6c\x79\x20\x61\x63\x68\x69\x65\x76\x65\x73\x20\x68\x65\x72\x20\x6c\x69\x66\x65\x6c\x6f\x6e\x67\x20\x64\x72\x65\x61\x6d\x2e
\x54\x68\x65\x20\x73\x74\x61\x72\x73\x20\x74\x77\x69\x6e\x6b\x6c\x65\x20\x6c\x69\x6b\x65\x20\x64\x69\x61\x6d\x6f\x6e\x64\x73\x20\x69\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x6e\x69\x67\x68\x74\x20\x73\x6b\x79\x2c\x20\x63\x72\x65\x61\x74\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x61\x20\x6d\x61\x67\x69\x63\x61\x6c\x20\x61\x74\x6d\x6f\x73\x70\x68\x65\x72\x65\x2e
\x49\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x6b\x69\x74\x63\x68\x65\x6e\x2c\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x63\x68\x65\x66\x20\x73\x6b\x69\x6c\x6c\x66\x75\x6c\x6c\x79\x20\x70\x72\x65\x70\x61\x72\x65\x73\x20\x61\x20\x64\x65\x6c\x69\x63\x69\x6f\x75\x73\x20\x74\x68\x72\x65\x65\x2d\x63\x6f\x75\x72\x73\x65\x20\x6d\x65\x61\x6c\x2e
\x54\x68\x65\x20\x73\x6f\x75\x6e\x64\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x77\x61\x76\x65\x73\x20\x6c\x61\x70\x70\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x61\x67\x61\x69\x6e\x73\x74\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x62\x6f\x61\x74\x27\x73\x20\x68\x75\x6c\x6c\x20\x6c\x75\x6c\x6c\x73\x20\x6d\x65\x20\x69\x6e\x74\x6f\x20\x61\x20\x73\x65\x6e\x73\x65\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x74\x72\x61\x6e\x71\x75\x69\x6c\x69\x74\x79\x2e
\x54\x68\x65\x20\x61\x6e\x63\x69\x65\x6e\x74\x20\x63\x61\x73\x74\x6c\x65\x20\x73\x69\x74\x73\x20\x61\x74\x6f\x70\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x68\x69\x6c\x6c\x2c\x20\x6f\x76\x65\x72\x6c\x6f\x6f\x6b\x69\x6e\x67\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x70\x69\x63\x74\x75\x72\x65\x73\x71\x75\x65\x20\x76\x69\x6c\x6c\x61\x67\x65\x20\x62\x65\x6c\x6f\x77\x2e
\x41\x73\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x66\x69\x72\x73\x74\x20\x73\x6e\x6f\x77\x66\x6c\x61\x6b\x65\x73\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x77\x69\x6e\x74\x65\x72\x20\x66\x61\x6c\x6c\x2c\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x77\x6f\x72\x6c\x64\x20\x74\x75\x72\x6e\x73\x20\x69\x6e\x74\x6f\x20\x61\x20\x77\x69\x6e\x74\x65\x72\x20\x77\x6f\x6e\x64\x65\x72\x6c\x61\x6e\x64\x2e
\x57\x69\x74\x68\x20\x61\x20\x63\x61\x6e\x76\x61\x73\x20\x61\x6e\x64\x20\x70\x61\x69\x6e\x74\x62\x72\x75\x73\x68\x20\x69\x6e\x20\x68\x61\x6e\x64\x2c\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x61\x72\x74\x69\x73\x74\x20\x62\x72\x69\x6e\x67\x73\x20\x6c\x69\x66\x65\x20\x74\x6f\x20\x61\x20\x62\x6c\x61\x6e\x6b\x20\x73\x70\x61\x63\x65\x2e
\x49\x6e\x20\x74\x68\x65\x20\x63\x72\x6f\x77\x64\x65\x64\x20\x6d\x61\x72\x6b\x65\x74\x2c\x20\x76\x65\x6e\x64\x6f\x72\x73\x20\x65\x6e\x74\x68\x75\x73\x69\x61\x73\x74\x69\x63\x61\x6c\x6c\x79\x20\x70\x72\x6f\x6d\x6f\x74\x65\x20\x74\x68\x65\x69\x72\x20\x63\x6f\x6c\x6f\x72\x66\x75\x6c\x20\x61\x72\x72\x61\x79\x20\x6f\x66\x20\x67\x6f\x6f\x64\x73\x2e
\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x41\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62\x62
